p: In terms of results and effectiveness, the attendees spoke with their feet. We had continual questions and interactions for the full day, often with people waiting to have a turn at the each of the demonstrations. Some children and parents kept coming back to chat, or to explore a different aspect of the simulations. We found they also built on the concepts in our materials, discussing herd immunity and seeing the relevance to current issues such as measles outbreaks and global epidemics.
